column4: hey everyone, anyone have experience converting avi movies to a compatible mpeg4 format that works with the ipod video?
Yup, you need to rebuild ffmpeg and it'll be right.
do you know how to do it using mencoder?
No idea... I have a little script here that I use (You cna use the ffmpeg I built, if you want to)
That's the ffmpeg calls h.264 support.
Run that as "vidpod.sh FILENAME wide" or "vidposd.sh FILENAME"
And it'll spit out a .mp4 file for you.
dpkg informs me that there is an older version of ffmpeg in the repos...should I use it, or the one you built?
use the one I built, the one in the repos doesn't have support for H264
